content: Hi, I have recently moved from PAS/EMM/EMR to the IVF industry. I'm working with various parties (including big Pharma) on integration between lab equipment, mobile devices, in-home devices, and IVF focussed EMRs. Is there much progress in FHIR for support in this industry? I would be interested in joining and working group and promoting FHIR to my customers/contributing where I can ..

I would think that the base Observation, MedicationAdministration and Procedure resources would probably cover most of that space. I don't recall seeing much in the way of IVF questions come through. Are there particular areas you're worried wouldn't be well-covered?
